markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Basiri, Wellspring Keeper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2432)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 49

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 47

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 44
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 19">[Basiri, Wellspring Keeper](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2432)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 38</row>

**Perception** +33; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Sphinx](/Languages.aspx?ID=35); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet, [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +31, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +37, [Bardic Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +35, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +32, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +32, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +32, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +33, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +33

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +10

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** +6

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Bardic Lore** Sphinxes are naturally curious, and their love of puzzles and mysteries leads them to gather information on a broad range of topics. Sphinxes have the [Bardic Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=179) bard feat, allowing them to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) on any topic.

**Items**
[_third eye_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=466)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 40 

**Fort** +31 

**Ref** +31 

**Will** +37 

</row>

**HP** 400
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyze](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 20, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 20, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 20, piercing 20, slashing 20

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, swim 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +36 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 4d8+18 slashing

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 41
- **Cantrips (9th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **4th**
[Clairaudience](/Spells.aspx?ID=39) (at will), [Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40) (at will), [Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247) (at will), [Remove Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=250) (at will), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) (at will)
- **5th**
[Locate](/Spells.aspx?ID=173)
- **9th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78)
- **Constant (9th)**
[Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Rituals** DC 41

- **6th**
[Commune](/Rituals.aspx?ID=6)
- **7th**
[Legend Lore](/Rituals.aspx?ID=15)

**Aquatic Assault** <actions string="Single Action" />  Basiri Swims and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If both she and her opponent are submerged underwater, she can Strike one additional time.

**Harness Wellspring** <actions string="Single Action" />  Basiri draws upon the necromantic wellspring to power her spellcasting. During her turn, she gains the ability to cast one of the following spells, heightened to 9th level: [_spirit blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) or [_spirit song_](/Spells.aspx?ID=303).

**Wellspring Guardian**   Once per day, Basiri can protect the necromantic wellspring by inscribing a magical sigil around the wellspring orrery. The first time a creature other than Basiri touches the orrery, that creature must succeed at a DC 41 Will save or be affected by [_spirit blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) (9th).

</column>
name: Basiri, Wellspring Keeper

Sphinxes have the Bardic Lore bard feat, allowing them to Recall Knowledge on any topic. Items third eye --- AC 40 Fort +31 Ref +31 Will +37 HP 400 (negative healing) Immunities death effects, disease, paralyze, poison, unconscious Resistances cold 20, electricity 20, fire 20, piercing 20, slashing 20 --- Speed 35 feet, swim 40 feet Melee Single Action claw +36 (Agile), Damage 4d8+18 slashing Occult Innate Spells DC 41 - Cantrips (9th) Detect Magic, Read Aura - 4th Clairaudience (at will), Clairvoyance (at will), Read Omens (at will), Remove Curse (at will), Ventriloquism (at will) - 5th Locate - 9th Dispel Magic - Constant (9th) Tongues, True Seeing Rituals DC 41 - 6th Commune - 7th Legend Lore Aquatic Assault Single Action Basiri Swims and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If both she and her opponent are submerged underwater, she can Strike one additional time. Harness Wellspring Single Action Basiri draws upon the necromantic wellspring to power her spellcasting. During her turn, she gains the ability to cast one of the following spells, heightened to 9th level: spirit blast or spirit song . Wellspring Guardian Once per day, Basiri can protect the necromantic wellspring by inscribing a magical sigil around the wellspring orrery. The first time a creature other than Basiri touches the orrery, that creature must succeed at a DC 41 Will save or be affected by spirit blast (9th).
